rules_text:
When Serafhin, Temporal Investigator enters, exile up to one other target nonland permanent. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of their next end step.
If Serafhin, Temporal Investigator would enter from exile, it enters transformed.
special_text2:
As long as it's an extra turn, you may activate the loyalty abilities of Serafhin, Sundered [/i][i]Paradox[/i][i] twice each turn.
[+1]: Exile a nonland permanent or a card in your hand with three time counters on it. If it doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend.
[-X]: Remove X counters from target permanent or card in exile.
[-8]: Take two extra turns after this one.
[-8]: Take two extra turns after this one.
